title: Call waitForRecoveriesToFinish(false); in the Streaming and SQL tests.
description: Today the TestSQLHandler test cases began failing. It turned out that they weren't calling waitForRecoveriesToFinish(false);. This ticket adds the method call to all the Streaming/SQL test cases.
